marvel.description: Milos Masaryk, a Soviet intelligence agent assigned as a security guard for Anton Vanko, a Soviet inventor who developed the Crimson Dynamo armor, was tasked by the Soviet government to retrieve Vanko after he defected to the United States.

name: Unicorn
powersText: Highly proficient in the use of knives
Superhuman strength and endurance via radiation treatments
force field generation and magnetic levitation via emitter on brow of suit
